document_data.name: Aundegul Shawn
document_data.mainbody: '''Aundegul Shawn''' was the owner of the [[Blade and Stars]] inn in [[Baldur's Gate]] in [[1359 DR]].
document_data.History: Aundegul was an adventurer until a duel between two master shapechanger [[wizard]]s killed all his companions and shocked him.
document_data.Activities: Aundegul managed the inn, where a [[yuan-ti]] was imprisoned and darker secrets were hidden.
document_data.Personality: Aundegul knew many secrets but seldom spoke. His passion was making ruby cordial for customers.
